description: Officials reported on Saturday that seven Japanese nationals were among the 20 hostages killed in a terrorist attack at a restaurant in Dhaka, Bangladesh, on Friday.
title: Japanese Officials React to Dhaka Attack
title_page: Japanese Officials React to Dhaka Attack - Video - NYTimes.com
text: Officials reported on Saturday that seven Japanese nationals were among the 20 hostages killed in a terrorist attack at a restaurant in Dhaka, Bangladesh, on Friday.
